questions.title: Question 6 for Class 190904
questions.main: Suppose that 5 of this year's tropical storms develop into hurricanes over the north Atlantic Ocean. The name of the third hurricane would start with the letter ____.

questions.title: Question 9 for Class 190904
questions.main: Research is being conducted in this class to assess the affect of the use of technology in large classes. The results will be used after the semester is over to improve the course. Your honest participation is appreciated.

mcq.option: A) I consent to having my survey responses included in the research study.
B) I do not consent to having my survey responses included in the research study.
